website_summaries.verdict: This over 4,000 piece LEGO set comes with tons of figures and lots of extras.
pros: An upgrade from the 2008 Death Star with a lot of detail
Takes many hours to put together, but people who buy it say it's worth the price for LEGO lovers looking for a challenge
cons: The set has some problems coming with missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Lego obsessed son. Can't believe I paid as much as I did, but we're all excited to build it!
customer_reviews.author: Teachermommy

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loves it and had many hours of enjoyment putting it together
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son has wanted the Death Star set for several years so this year for Christmas I decided to get it for him. He absolutely loves it and had many hours of enjoyment putting it together. There is a lot of pieces and a lot going on. The instruction manual is huge! He rated this as the best Lego set out of the hundreds he's put together. Yes, it's expensive but if your kid is like mine and puts the 500-1000 piece sets together in almost no time this is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: trytych

customer_reviews.title: I was so apprehensive about purchasing this because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so apprehensive about purchasing this because of the price. It is so worth it, though. My daughter just LOVES IT!!! She says there are so many features, and very accurate to the movie! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: judi c

customer_reviews.title: This Lego set is awesome! And so much fun to put together
customer_reviews.text: Living in a rural area and being able to make this purchase online with Amazon Prime was "almost" instant gratification. This Lego set is awesome! And so much fun to put together. My 10 year old boy had it done in a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Whiteaker

customer_reviews.title: He was able to easily put this together over the course of a week
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly with no missing parts. Bought this for our 12 year old son. He was able to easily put this together over the course of a week. It is really awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: This set is fun of playful and fun features! There are some areas that don't look right to the eye but they are small and a small price to pay for this set! On the subject of price, it may be over priced (I for one thought it should have been $450 but LEGO always over prices there Star Wars sets) but even though it cost $500 it is still worth it! If you are younger than 13 years old I would not advise getting this set. It was a very long build that, although it was very fun, was tiring. This set is one of Star Wars' best UCS sets to date and is fun for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Y.

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate power in the Lego Universe!
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say other than this set is incredible. It's a very large, detailed and long build. This newest iteration is much more stable than its predecessor and the quality of the minifigures is amazing. You get 25 proper minifigures and over 4,000 Lego elements in this kit! Great set for children and adults alike as this provides hours and hours of building and play. 5/5 and as always great shipping speed and customer service from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: AFOL builder

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Truly awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This set was amazing in every respect. So many pieces, so many details, such a great design and such an impressive final result. The instruction book is massive and a collector's piece in its own regard. Best part was how long it took to put together and all the casual conversation with my son ("quality time") that took place over the days we did it together.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Star Wars Death Star
customer_reviews.text: My son saved all of his money for an entire year to purchase this and it's AMAZING! VERY EXPENSIVE, but WOW! I had my doubts about it because of the cost, but it really is so cool! My son and daughter usually put their LEGO sets together within one day, but this one did take several months of building. Good quality time together for them. We would all highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: but it was so much fun building it with my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Took us 20 hours to build the Death Start, but it was so much fun building it with my daughter. Great Christmas present for her. I never though I'd spend $500 on one Lego set, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: munchie

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: My son saved for 2 years for this set. Finally got it and all the stickers are missing. Has to wait 2 weeks for replacement. You'd think for $500 they would have expedite shipping for their error.
customer_reviews.author: Kraftee Beaver

customer_reviews.title: LEGO awesome, missing pieces NOT
customer_reviews.text: Love the LEGO products. Do NOT like that one bag of bricks was open and within the first four hours of building we have found 3 missing pieces. Makes me nervous for how many more are missing. Fortunately, we had the exact piece for one of the missing but we do not for the other two. So now what?? After paying nearly $900 I’m not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Primus

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: Great LEGO set! Had a lot of bags and pieces. Loads of fun. The variety of mini figures are amazing, and the many functions on the Death Star are incredible. This will take some hours to build, but it is fun, if you have the patience.
customer_reviews.author: zhi j lin

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO Set for any Star Wars fan
customer_reviews.text: Great LEGO Set for any Star Wars fan. Sort of pricey but, is a great addition to any Star Wars or LEGO fan. I also wish the set would come with a bit more exclusive prints or minifigs. Anyways, the set looks great on display and has great play value. This is great for someone who likes to keep LEGOs on display or like just likes to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Recipient loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a child's birthday gift, and he loved it! He spent every spare moment for a month working to complete it and was delighted with all the features--the trash compactor, the elevator, the laser beam, and the many, many figurines.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Star Wars!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice gift for your Lego lover in the family. I heard it's a Classic now and my son has it, and did an excellent job, I might add, of constructing this fantastic micro-Lego rendition of a starbase. Need a high spot to display it in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $500
customer_reviews.text: Half way into the build, many many hours later. Still not sure why this is so expensive. LEGO certainly could or should have created a way to encapsulate this with hinged walls. I would not be surprised if a later version comes out with just that, simply to sell another version of an already over priced item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome play set but mine is part of a collection. Lots of Lego figures to set it up. A bit pricey. I enjoyed putting this together and was definitely not disappointed. If you have children, they would have many hours of fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift for Niece
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gift for my 10 year old niece. She has been asking for this gift for three years. I think she is going to love it. Glad all the pieces are in plastic in the Lego box. The Lego box was in another box but USPS left the box on my porch without plastic on it and it rained on the outer box for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie T.

customer_reviews.title: Open packages, missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to build! Unfortunately there were several bags ripped when I opened the box and pieces were everywhere and some were missing. I had to order individual pieces from lego to finish this.
customer_reviews.author: Srazzin

customer_reviews.title: A  hit for my son!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loved building this set and plays with it. He felt very accomplished to be able to build this. He enjoys building with Legos and has built many other sets. He is a big fan of Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela K

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my nephew for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for Christmas....He absolutely loves it......very challenging to build.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Star Wars and LEGO fans alike
customer_reviews.text: If you already have the Death Star released before this , do not buy this. With that aside, this is an exceptional set with detail, playability, and function as a display piece.
customer_reviews.author: brayan hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Lego is always a good choice. Always.
customer_reviews.text: Its Lego, why do you need to read a review for Lego?
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Box damage
customer_reviews.text: I’m unhappy about the damage and creasing on the box im a new never opened in box type collector and the condition of the box makes a difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun product!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 14 year old son’s birthday and he love it! Quality, lots of pieces and fun to build . Worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: An iconic set
customer_reviews.text: This LEGO is everything you can dream of. It comes from different scenarios from Star Wars movies 4,5 and 6. It has a lot of detail into it. If you are a big fan of legos and Star Wars, this is the set for you. I highly recommend that if this is a set for your child that you help him, it’s a big set, some parts might be confusing if you don’t have that much of experience. Finally I must say that I’m really enjoying it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Rimmert De Jong

customer_reviews.title: FEW IMPERFECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. Had the original as a kid and got rid of it (stupidly), got back into legos and was a good first addition. Not 5 Stars because it was missing pieces but Amazon sent a replacement and allowed me to take the pieces I needed from a replacement set. And 2) $100 more for only 200 more pieces compared to the old one being $399. Overall positive review! :)
customer_reviews.author: Devin Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Too bad because my son spent his money and worked tirelessly ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of details on this Death Star, but the stability of the detail sleaves much to be desired. The different parts of the Death Star keep falling off as soon as anyone reaches in to move a door or to set a figure. This LEGO set was not meant to be played, to be displayed in a case. Too bad because my son spent his money and worked tirelessly to finish it so he could play it.
customer_reviews.author: littlelieu

customer_reviews.title: Will have lots of fun putting this together
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow, this arrived in huge box with the biggest instruction booklet I have ever seen. Will have lots of fun putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I erally like the little details and movable parts and all the ...
customer_reviews.text: boyfriend built it in 12 hours and he loves it. I erally like the little details and movable parts and all the references to the movies in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Kailynlg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Love the size and lots of fun to build.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: What a 🧸
customer_reviews.text: What a excellent collection model for a Star Wars ethuses.
customer_reviews.author: Art grayAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it ok
customer_reviews.text: a good set and if you like the death star get it. But when i got it and open it up to build i did not find no stickers and had to get the 2008 death star stickers from eBay since it the only ones they had.But beside that it a great set.
customer_reviews.author: vincenza polito

customer_reviews.title: Open product and damaged box
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in was damaged, the box was taped like it was already open and there was a package that was opened and some of the pieces were falling out. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Slehc3883

customer_reviews.title: Death Star is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with the price and the product. It was complete. The box was almost in mint condition, and the item had not been opened before. My son purchased this with his own money and was very happy with the completed product.
customer_reviews.author: Hay Fam

customer_reviews.title: Challenging but flows easy.
customer_reviews.text: My son had his built in 3 weeks. We fully anticipated it being 8 weeks. He's 13 and tends to hit a stall when building other large set's. This one is staged just right. Challenging but flows easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: My son saved up $500 dollars and purchased this so it was a pretty big deal for him. He has wanted one for a few years. He is happy with the Death Star, however, he wanted me to write a review to let everyone know that about 50 pieces were missing that were supposed to be in the package. We did not return it because he has enough legos that he was able to find the pieces he needed among his own but he wanted everyone to know in case they spent $500 dollars on this product only to have missing pieces and not be able to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrinapch

customer_reviews.title: Few pieces are missing
customer_reviews.text: At least 5 pieces are missing from the package, otherwise is good.
customer_reviews.author: bbw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was EXPENSIVE, but sooooooo worth it!!!!!!!!! My whole family loves it!! Mostly my 11 & 7 year olds!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Missing Vital Pieces. If you can, find the discontinued LDS.
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed. Was Missing Vital Pieces. Paid $560.. Very Common Pieces Too. Debbie Downer for my Son who couldn't complete it.. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift for our 8yr old. We all spent some time building it...but in the end, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Pataska

customer_reviews.title: double boxed
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived in mint condition inside a protective box inside the Amazon box. The protective box really helped.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Bag was open
customer_reviews.text: I paid over 700$ for this LEGO set and I am building it not and one of the bags is open possible missing pieces
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Knott

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased !
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased to see the box was new in perfect condition with no defects. We actually received the package earlier than expected. Very happy !
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Huge! Took us 2 days to assemble, but was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the quick delivery and awesome toy. My grandson is having a wonderful summer putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: robert a vellela

customer_reviews.title: It’s big!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Love all the mini figures, the complexity of it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unit was great but it had a few missing parts but they ...
customer_reviews.text: unit was great but it had a few missing parts but they were replaced by LEGO though it takes a while to get them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love... My second grade, Lego and Star Wars obsessed son completed this set with ease. The detail is truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old grandson completed in 1 week. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: meme1951

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gift for my son's graduation. just what he wanted and expected!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this set! He is 10 & put it together in 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, My son really love it!. Hours of play time!!!
customer_reviews.author: neriya

customer_reviews.title: He is very very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My son saved his money for a year for this. He is very very happy with it. It does look fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces. So sad.
customer_reviews.text: My son saved allowance for a year and a half and we spilt the cost. He has been so excited to build this. Sadly, multiple pieces have been missing and he’s only 1/3 done. Luckily he has a lot of loose legos and he’s been able to replace them with LEGO’s of different or sometimes the same color. He is extremely careful, so I believe they were missing and not lost. Pretty disappointing considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scientist

customer_reviews.title: It was a present for a nephew, once he ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a present for a nephew, once he is done I'll tell you my opinion... It will be shipped to Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Angel Perez

customer_reviews.title: 3 bags of parts completely missing!!
customer_reviews.text: We received a fully sealed box which I gave my son for an early Christmas present. He spent 12 hrs putting it together, but couldn't finish because at least 3 bags of pieces are missing. The item itself is fantastic and we've never had issues like this before (we are big time Lego buyers) but I can't see how Lego can do this with a $500 set. Really a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kolding

customer_reviews.title: FAKE LEGO?
customer_reviews.text: Spent $500 on this item and just got the time to start building it. Found "unrelated" items inside the sealed bags and sealed box - cart wheels / plastic deer toy figures / and "Greenberg's Guide to LGB Trains" manual..... Did I receive a "FAKE" / "KNOCKOFF" Lego product? Hard to return it now since I have taken it to Asia to build it with my friend.....(this box is as big as a full 24" luggage to haul on a plane)
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered as expects. Unfortunately, lego shortted the set some pieces. It’s a little hard to build if all the pieces aren’t there! Luckily, I have a small lego fun store that up/resells lego pieces and sets a few towns over and we found some pieces that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Leisure Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with Lego. A $500 set and at least one if not more pieces missing from each set of bags. The best part is that the website to order missing parts is back logged so who knows when we will actually get the pieces. Would be a great set otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Krista B.

customer_reviews.title: VERY  COMPLEX
customer_reviews.text: I would never have had paid that much for it I would not recommend this for anyone that is a kid it is for collectors only that means adults
customer_reviews.author: S. O.

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars Death Star 75159 Space Station Building Kit with Star Wars Minifigures for Kids and Adults (4,016 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Reenact amazing scenes from the Star Wars saga with the Empire's ultimate planet-zapping space station- the Death Star! With over 4,000 pieces, this fantastic LEGO Star Wars building toy has a galaxy of intricate and authentic environments for creative play, including a super laser control room, Imperial conference chamber, hangar bay with moving launch rack and Lord Vader's TIE Advanced with space for Vader inside. This building kit also comes with a variety of Star Wars figures that can role play throughout Emperor Palpatine's throne room, Droid maintenance room, detention block, trash compactor, tractor beam, cargo area, and much more. Plus, there are 2 movable turbo laser towers that include turbo lasers with spring-loaded shooters and seats for the 2 Death Star Gunners. Also included are 23 iconic Star Wars minifigures and 2 Droid LEGO figures to ensure hours of fun on the battle station. Weapons include 3 Lightsabers, 4 blasters, 3 blaster pistols, 4 blaster rifles, 2 force pikes, 2 Force Lightning elements and a bowcaster.
feature_bullets: Take building to a new level with the Death Star battle station and your favorite Star Wars minifigures. This detailed ultimate battle station of the evil Empire includes Princess Leia, Chewbacca, and Darth Vader minifigures; plus 20 other minifigures

Act out your favorite scenes with Grand Moff Tarkin, Emperor Palpatine, Imperial Navy Officer, Imperial Officer, 2 Stormtroopers, 2 Death Star Troopers, 2 Emperor’s Royal Guards, 2 Death Star Gunners, Death Star Droid, and Obi-Wan Kenobi

This Star Wars construction toy also includes C-3PO, a disguised Han Solo, 3 Luke Skywalker minifigures (Tatooine, disguised, and Final Duel), plus R2-D2, an Imperial Astromech and a buildable Dianoga trash compactor monster
The LEGO Star Wars Death Star building toy, including the battle tower, TIE Advanced x1 and more are compatible with all LEGO Star Wars construction sets for creative play
This Death Star includes key locations and features from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi; plus all of your favorite star wars character miniatures

Our Death Star construction toy measures over 16-inch high and 16-inch and includes 4,016 pieces. It's the perfect toy for 14 year old boys and girls and adults of all ages. Warning: choking hazard from small parts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars172 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
